svg:svg.svg:title: KSBCSP × Design Team — Tech × Design Creative Night
svg:svg.svg:desc: Event poster with integrated icon system. All elements are vector paths, editable in Inkscape. Layers organized for easy template reuse.

svg:text.style: font-family:'Arial Black','Haas Grot Display','Impact',sans-serif; font-size:196px;font-weight:900; fill:#FFB800;letter-spacing:-4px; filter:url(#filter_title_glow)

svg:g.inkscape:label: 04 · Divider & Event Details
svg:g.svg:text: A hands-on collaborative evening where developers and designers build, brand, and ship together.

svg:g.inkscape:label: 99 · Notes (hide before export)
svg:g.svg:text: ↓ Icons: 54px grid, 2.4px stroke, round linecap — select any icon group to reuse
Replace QR placeholder with real code (use Extensions > Render > Barcode)
